# Silver Market Analysis App - COMEX vs SGE Spread Tracker

This is a Next.js TypeScript web application for tracking silver market spreads between COMEX and Shanghai Gold Exchange (SGE).

## Project Overview
- **Purpose**: Track and visualize physical silver availability and price spreads
- **Data Sources**: COMEX warehouse stocks, SGE benchmark prices, FX rates
- **Tech Stack**: Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Prisma, PostgreSQL
- **Key Features**: Daily data fetching, visualization, alerts, export functionality

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript strict mode
- Follow Next.js 14 App Router conventions
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling
- Implement proper error handling and logging
- Validate all data inputs
- Store raw data files for audit trail
